trends: There have been no other sightings in Connah's Quay
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the back garden about to go to bed, because the entrance to my room isat the back of the house. I first noticed the object because of its sound, I justhought it was a plane or jet at first, but as it closer I knew that it couldntof been because it hovered and it was a very unusual colour, I started to getquite scared because id heard quite a lot about ufo sightings, I was frozen onthe spot, it just hovered for a while about 5 minutes then got closer to ground,but not close enough to land. I lost sight of the object as it flew quicker andquicker towards the park about 12 a mile away from my house. then I lost sight.I havent been to the park to look around, Im to afraid.
